subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Nascar has called 31 debris cautions in 12 Nextel Cup races this season, 14 in the last 100 laps of these races.
snippet: Nascar has called 31 debris cautions in 12 Nextel Cup races this season, 14 in the last 100 laps of these races.
